name: Hearts of Iron II: Doomsday - Armageddon
name_original: Hearts of Iron II: Doomsday - Armageddon
description:
Hearts of Iron II: Doomsday - Armageddon is a strategy game developed by Paradox Interactive. It came out on 29-03-2007. Paradox Interactive published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
You can play Hearts of Iron II: Doomsday - Armageddon on PC.
